fields.name: ProvisionNoteHdr
fields.fieldText: Please add additional notes that should be considered while provisioning the account

fields.name: Select_Volunteer_Roles_with_BC_Fail
fields.fieldText: Select Volunteer Roles with BC Fail

fields.name: ProvisionNoteHdr2
fields.fieldText: Please add additional notes that should be considered while provisioning the account

fields.name: FONote8_0
fields.fieldText: {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} failed background check. Do you want to still consider for Volunteer role ?

fields.name: FOGFNote1
fields.fieldText: Once courses are completed by {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} in canvas, please confirm the completion of the courses below

fields.name: FONote71
fields.fieldText: Please select the courses and work shop schedule that need to be assigned {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} to onboard for Facilitator role. You can select more than 1 course.

fields.name: FONote2
fields.fieldText: Enter the scheduled interview date along with start and end time for {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c}

validationRule.errorMessage: To Date cannot be less than From Date

fields.name: FONote3
fields.fieldText: After reviewing the resume and talking to {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} , Please summarize the interview notes.

fields.name: optional_message_header
fields.fieldText: Insert an optional message to go to the applicant.

fields.name: FONotInterestedNote
fields.fieldText:
{!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c} {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} is no more interested in the volunteer role.


Volunteer Status will be updated as 'Not Interested' on account record.

screens.name: Remainder_at_the_end_of_3_months
screens.label: Remainder at the end of 3 months

fields.name: FOSixMonthsRemainder
fields.fieldText:
Please reach out to {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c} {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} around {!varRemainderDate} to check whether he/she still interested.


Task is being assigned to you to remind you to reach out {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c} {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} around {!varRemainderDate}

fields.name: FONote1
fields.fieldText: {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c} {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} is considering to onboard as volunteer?

fields.name: Check_back_in_3_months
fields.helpText: {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c} {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} will get the remainder in 3 months if - 'Will get back' is selected.

fields.name: FONote5
fields.fieldText:
Please upload the volunteer Emergency Contact Form received from {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c}


Email is sent with form links on {!varVolunteerFormSentOn}

fields.name: MeidaReleaseNote
fields.fieldText: Please upload the Media Release form received from {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c}
